channel.title: Comments on: Live from Boyle Heights

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: <strong>I love Mr. and Mrs. Harry</strong><br />I love Mr. and Mrs. Harry Cooper. Will they adopt me? I need a new set of grandparents. (I'm not sure I need more people asking me why I don't have kids, though.) ~ Tanja
item.content:encoded:
I love Mr. and Mrs. Harry
I love Mr. and Mrs. Harry Cooper. Will they adopt me? I need a new set of grandparents. (I’m not sure I need more people asking me why I don’t have kids, though.) ~ Tanja
